trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> class is used to get or set various LDAP session options.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> é usada para obter ou definir várias opções de sessão LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.AutoReconnect" /> property specifies if auto-reconnect is enabled.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.AutoReconnect" /> especifica se a reconexão automática está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if auto-reconnect is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se reconectar automaticamente está habilitado ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.DomainName" /> property returns the domain to which this connection is bound.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.DomainName" /> retorna o domínio ao qual esta conexão está associada.

trans-unit.source: The domain to which this connection is bound.
trans-unit.target: O domínio ao qual esta conexão está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.FastConcurrentBind" /> method enables support for fast concurrent binds.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.FastConcurrentBind" /> habilita o suporte para associações simultâneas rápida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: This method does not work on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não funciona na plataforma atual.

trans-unit.source: An LDAP error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro de LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostName" /> property returns the name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostName" /> retorna o nome do servidor LDAP associado à conexão.

trans-unit.source: The name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do servidor LDAP associado com a conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostReachable" /> property specifies whether the host is reachable.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostReachable" /> especifica se o host está acessível.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the host is reachable or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se o host está inacessível ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.LocatorFlag" /> property specifies one of the values of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.LocatorFlag" /> especifica um dos valores da enumeração <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> que são usados ao localizar um controlador de domínio.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> enumeração que são usados ao localizar um controlador de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingKeepAliveTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingKeepAliveTimeout" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica o número mínimo de segundos que o cliente espera, após a última resposta do servidor, antes de enviar um ping keep alive.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> objeto que especifica o número mínimo de segundos a espera do cliente, após a última resposta do servidor, antes de enviar um ping keep-alive.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified time span is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: O período especificado é menor que <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingLimit" /> property contains the number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingLimit" /> contém o número de pings não respondidos que o cliente envia antes de fechar uma conexão.

trans-unit.source: The number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
trans-unit.target: O número de pings não respondidos que o cliente envia antes de fechar uma conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingWaitTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingWaitTimeout" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica o número de milissegundos que o cliente aguarda pela resposta após enviar um ping.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> objeto que especifica o número de milissegundos que o cliente aguarda a resposta após enviar um ping.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified time span is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: O período especificado é menor que <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion" /> property specifies the LDAP protocol version to use.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion" /> especifica a versão do protocolo LDAP a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: The LDAP protocol version to use.
trans-unit.target: A versão do protocolo LDAP a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> que especifica a função de retorno de chamada padrão usada para especificar certificados do cliente ao estabelecer uma conexão SSL.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> objeto que especifica a função de retorno de chamada padrão usado para especificar os certificados de cliente ao estabelecer uma conexão SSL.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object is also set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> objeto também é definido, o certificado especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralCallback" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralCallback" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> que especifica a função de retorno de chamada padrão usada ao buscar referências.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> objeto que especifica a função de retorno de chamada padrão usado quando a busca de referências.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralChasing" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralChasing" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> que especifica como a biblioteca LDAP segue referências retornadas por servidores LDAP.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> objeto que especifica como a biblioteca LDAP segue referências retornadas por servidores LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not defined in <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é definido em <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralHopLimit" /> property specifies the number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralHopLimit" /> especifica o número de saltos permitidos ao buscar referências.

trans-unit.source: The number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: O número de saltos permitida quando a busca de referências.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.RootDseCache" /> property enables the internal RootDSE cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.RootDseCache" /> habilita o cache RootDSE interno.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the cache is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se o cache está habilitado ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SaslMethod" /> property specifies the preferred Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) binding method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SaslMethod" /> especifica o método de associação de SASL (Simple Authentication and Security Layer).

trans-unit.source: The preferred SASL binding method.
trans-unit.target: O método preferencial de ligação SASL.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Sealing" /> property enables Kerberos encryption.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Sealing" /> habilita a criptografia Kerberos.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if Kerberos encryption is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se criptografia Kerberos estiver habilitada ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer" /> property enables secure socket layer on connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer" /> habilita SSL na conexão.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if secure socket layer is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se a camada de soquete seguro está habilitada ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecurityContext" /> property specifies the security context associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecurityContext" /> especifica o contexto de segurança associado à conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: The security context associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de segurança associado com a conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SendTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the send time-out.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SendTimeout" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica o tempo limite de envio.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the send time-out.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> objeto que especifica o tempo limite de envio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Signing" /> property enables Kerberos encryption.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Signing" /> habilita a criptografia Kerberos.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if Kerberos encryption is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se criptografia Kerberos estiver habilitada ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SslInformation" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> object that contains data about the current secure connection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SslInformation" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> que contém dados sobre a atual conexão segura.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> object that contains data about the current secure connection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> objeto que contém dados sobre a atual conexão segura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SspiFlag" /> property specifies the flags to pass to the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) InitializeSecurityContext function.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SspiFlag" /> especifica os sinalizadores a serem passados para a função InitializeSecurityContext da interface SSPI.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the InitializeSecurityContext function, see the InitializeSecurityContext function topic in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a função InitializeSecurityContext, confira o tópico da função InitializeSecurityContext na Biblioteca MSDN, em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The flags to pass to the SSPI InitializeSecurityContext function.
trans-unit.target: Os sinalizadores para passar para a função InitializeSecurityContext SSPI.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection" /> object that contains the controls to use.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection" /> que contém os controles a serem usados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection)" /> method starts transport layer security encryption.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection)" /> inicia a criptografia de segurança de camada de transporte.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The request failed.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação falhou.

trans-unit.source: An LDAP error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro de LDAP.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StopTransportLayerSecurity" /> method ends transport layer security encryption.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StopTransportLayerSecurity" /> termina a criptografia de segurança de camada de transporte.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The request failed.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação falhou.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.TcpKeepAlive" /> property enables TCP keep-alive.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.TcpKeepAlive" /> permite o keep alive do TCP.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if TCP keep-alive is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é <see langword="true" /> se keep-alive do TCP está habilitado ou <see langword="false" /> se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate" /> contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> que especifica o método de retorno de chamada padrão usado para verificar os certificados de servidor quando uma conexão SSL é estabelecida.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> que especifica um método de retorno de chamada padrão usado para verificar os certificados de servidor quando uma conexão SSL é estabelecida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> já foi descartado.
